spec_data.Name: nhn-nanum-gothic-coding-fonts
spec_data.Description:
Nanum Gothic Coding fonts are set of Gothic Korean font faces suitable
for source code editing, designed by Sandoll Communication and
published by NHN Corporation.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 01:26:36 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Nanum Gothic Coding family of Korean TrueType fonts
